p:
Compound 2 was reported among a series of pyrazole derivatives 2–4 with CDK-1/2 inhibitory activities
16 . Compound 2 displayed inhibitory activity against CDK-2 with an IC 50 value of 140 nM. Substitution on the benzoyl ring in compound 2 with 2,6-difluoro groups afforded compound 3 with a 46-fold increase in CDK-2 inhibitory activity, Figure 1.
